If equal to or greater than 2: Physical DMG dealt is converted to Electro DMG;
If equal to or greater than 4: DMG dealt +2;
If equal to or greater than 6: Indwelling Level -4.

Charged Attack
When the total number of Elemental Dice is even, the Normal Attack to use will be considered a Charged Attack.

skill.name: Oceanid Mimic Summoning
skill.description:
Randomly summons 1 Oceanid Mimic (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones).

Oceanic Mimic
There are 3 kinds of Oceanid Mimic in total:
Ferret: Deal 2 Hydro DMG at the End Phase. 2 Uses.
Raptor: Deal 1 Hydro DMG at the End Phase. 3 Uses.
Frog: Can block 2 DMG. Once this effect is depleted, deal 2 Hydro DMG.

skill2.name: The Myriad Wilds
skill2.description:

Oceanic Mimic

Ferret: Deal 2 Hydro DMG at the End Phase. 2 Uses.
Raptor: Deal 1 Hydro DMG at the End Phase. 3 Uses.
Frog: Can block 2 DMG. Once this effect is depleted, deal 2 Hydro DMG.

Once per Round: The character deals +1 DMG. Once the Stonehide attached to the character is removed, this status will be removed alongside it.
